title1: You can made it with us
desc2: HQP helps tech learning. Collaborative and supportive environment for tech skill advancement.
ScienceDesc: Community posts on science. Accessible knowledge from experts and enthusiasts. Fosters love of learning.
HelpDesc: Community with mutual aid. Collaboration and support for collective growth.
Desc: HQP is a Moroccan non-profit, passionate high school students. Seeks brilliant individuals for community development. Aims for self-fulfillment, understanding, respect and a peaceful community.
Goal1: we will provide an inspired space of work where you can be motivated in
Goal2: we will listen to all your ideas and help you implement them in real life on top of that we are a community of talented people
Goal3: The community can help you success in your business relationships for life and more benefits.
DiscCours: A community offering paid tutorials in programming covers essential skills like front-end/back-end dev, C++, and cyber security, helping individuals gain in-demand skills and boosting their career prospects.
GroopsDesc: join to the groups you are intrested in
Answer: Answer to the most common questions
Vip: How can you apply to Vip membership ?
description1: You can apply to our Vip membership by first choosing your field. What do you want to learn and why next choose your plan and contact us for more info
description2: Yes, we do volunteering classes which are supported by hqp people and always our classes are available on  our discord server
description3: Being part of a. High quality people community can bring many benefits to individuals. It can provide a sense of belonging and connection with others who share similar interests, beliefs, or experiences. Communities can also offer opportunities for social support, personal growth, and learning. Members can participate in activities, events, and discussions that bring people together and foster a sense of unity.
description4: Additionally, being part of a community can provide a platform for individuals to give and receive help, support, and encouragement. Communities can also help to build a network of resources and connections that can be useful for personal or professional growth.
opinions: Opinions of members in this community
omaimaDesc: I'm a student in university the second year I chose to study at HQP because it was a good opportunity to learn more about C++ language and java i really recommend it because my class with prof anas was so interesting  i wish i could lean more for them and thank you so much for this chance
redwanDesc: Je suis très heureux d'avoir rejoint ce groupe, et je tiens à remercier tous ses membres pour leur participation et pour m'avoir aidé à développer mon niveaux en programmation et tout ce qui s'y rapporte
fatimaDesc: İt's an amazing experience.i learned a lot of things and I'm so glad of being a vip member with HQP
fadmaDesc: Both teachers Yassine and Anas full of knowledge and excitement.. 5 stars all day long.. and punctual eveytime they use the most simple method so even for a new born it's a walk in the park !! ...
